title: Pepper Black Essential Oil
description: 100% pure & natural Pepper Black oil has a warm, spicy scent that is used to give a masculine fragrance in cosmetics. When used in small concentrations it has many topical benefits for the body and can help provide a distraction to those looking to quit smoking.
cleaned_text: Pepper Black is best known as a common cooking spice that enhances the flavor of foods, but it's topical benefits when diluted with a carrier oil, are equally noteworthy. This essential oil has a chemical structure similar to Melissa, contributing to its reputation as an oil that soothes nerves and lessens anxious feelings.Uses of Pepper Black Essential Oil IndiaHistory and Background Historically, it was considered sacred and was even used as a form of currency. It was so valuable that it was traded for gold and was one of the most prized trade items exported from India to the rest of the world. It was considered more valuable than gold. Thousands of years ago, Black Pepper was prescribed in Ayurvedic, Unani, Siddha, and Traditional Chinese medicine texts for curing colds, recurring pains, fevers and in purifying treatments, especially for Malaria. It is considered stimulating, reviving, comforting, and improves mental clarity and memory. It has an affinity for the 1st chakra and issues around impotence, builds kundalini and moves energy to the 2nd chakra.Physical Description Coloress to pale olive in color with a thin, watery consistency.Aromatic Description Fresh, dry-woody, warm, and spicy aroma.Biological distillation from black peppercorns, dried and crushed. Light and heavy oils are produced by extraction of low or high boiling fractions. Oleoresin produced by solvent extraction.Information for Aromatherapists Pepper Black essential oil is a middle to top note and blends well with Bergamot, Clary Sage, Clove, Coriander, Fennel, Frankincense, Geranium, Ginger, Grapefruit, Lavender, Lemongrass, Lime, Mandarin, Marjoram, Myrrh, Orange, Nutmeg, Palmarosa, tree, Valerian, Ylang Ylang as well as other spice and florals oils in minute quantities. Pepper Black is a very strong oil and can take over a blend so use in small concentrations. Our Pepper Black essential oil is 100% pure and natural.
